K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-0: @136a 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-1: bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-4: pradzny'a aa pa bh'a sa pradzny'a ba lo ki te sarba dharma aan dha k'a ra bhi dharma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-6: siddhantu m'am bha ga ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-7: sarba dzny'a na san dha ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-8: bha ga ba ti bad tshe la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-9: pra sa ra te hasta ma ma su ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-17: aa gatstsha bha ga ba ti m'a bi lamba sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-18: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136a-19: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-038:136b-0: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i @136b gzungs rdzogs so ////
